commands.name: az functionapp deployment slot create
commands.syntax:
az functionapp deployment slot create --name
                                      --resource-group
                                      --slot
                                      [--configuration-source]
                                      [--deployment-container-image-name]
                                      [--docker-registry-server-password]
                                      [--docker-registry-server-user]
                                      [--https-only {false, true}]
                                      [--image]
                                      [--registry-password]
                                      [--registry-username]
examples: az functionapp deployment slot create --name MyFunctionapp --resource-group MyResourceGroup --slot staging

commands.name: az functionapp deployment slot delete
examples: az functionapp deployment slot delete --name MyFunctionapp --resource-group MyResourceGroup --slot staging

commands.name: az functionapp deployment slot list
examples: az functionapp deployment slot list --name MyFunctionapp --resource-group MyResourceGroup

commands.name: az functionapp deployment slot swap
commands.summary: Swap deployment slots for a function app.
commands.syntax:
az functionapp deployment slot swap --slot
                                    [--action {preview, reset, swap}]
                                    [--ids]
                                    [--name]
                                    [--preserve-vnet {false, true}]
                                    [--resource-group]
                                    [--subscription]
                                    [--target-slot]
examples:
az functionapp deployment slot swap  -g MyResourceGroup -n MyUniqueApp --slot staging \
    --target-slot production
